--- select_tablesample_with_cross_join.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  Singers A
  CROSS JOIN
  Singers B
  TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI (90 PERCENT)

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Expr: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    end:      89,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    List:     parser.SelectExprList{
      &parser.SelectExpr{
        pos:  9,
        end:  10,
        Expr: nil,
        Star: true,
        As:   (*parser.Ident)(nil),
      },
    },
    From: parser.FromItemList{
      &parser.FromItem{
        end:  89,
        Expr: &parser.Join{
          Op:     "CROSS",
          Method: "",
          Hint:   (*parser.Hint)(nil),
          Left:   &parser.TableName{
            end:   27,
            Ident: &parser.Ident{
              pos:  18,
              end:  25,
              Name: "Singers",
            },
            Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
            As:   &parser.Ident{
              pos:  26,
              end:  27,
              Name: "A",
            },
          },
          Right: &parser.TableName{
            end:   52,
            Ident: &parser.Ident{
              pos:  43,
              end:  50,
              Name: "Singers",
            },
            Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
            As:   &parser.Ident{
              pos:  51,
              end:  52,
              Name: "B",
            },
          },
          Cond: (*parser.JoinCondition)(nil),
        },
        Method: "BERNOULLI",
        Num:    &parser.IntLit{
          pos:   78,
          end:   80,
          Value: "90",
        },
        Rows: false,
      },
    },
    Where:   nil,
    GroupBy: parser.ExprList{},
    Having:  nil,
    OrderBy: parser.OrderExprList{},
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM Singers AS A CROSS JOIN Singers AS B TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI (90 PERCENT)
